title: Easy rider [DVD]
creator_credit: Dennis Hopper, Peter Fonda and Columbia
brief_description: This is a digitally remastered 30th anniversary collector’s edition of the modern classic tale of two carefree young men who take a leisurely motorcycle ride across the southern United States after concluding a drug deal to pay expenses. With an exceptional performance by Jack Nicholson as an alcoholic lawyer, the cast also includes Peter Fonda and Dennis Hopper.
